Text: wizard[-2]  I couldn't get the install wizard to work.  instructions[+2]  However, setting up using the quick start instructions was a breeze.  install[+2]  It's easy to install the security on this product but Linksys doesn't do a good job of explaining why its important.  If you buy, you should disable the SSID Broadcast, use MAC filtering and deploy some form of encryption (multiple choices)if you want to ensure your network is secure (all covered off in the manual).  If buying for home office or small business this is a must.  For effort free wireless network adaptors, use the linksys USB adaptor.  If you need convincing on the security side, read Wireless Hacks, (this is a book of excellent tips, not just security), published by O'Reilly.  Knocked 1 star off for the install wizard - it wasted alot of time running it.
